import { useContext, useState } from "react" import { GlobalContext } from "../GlobalProvider" import { Editor } from "@tinymce/tinymce-react" function EditEditor(props) { const [subject, setSubject] = useState("") const [emailBody, setEmailBody] = useState("") const handleEditorChange = (e) => { props.setPlainEmail(e.target.getContent({format: "text"})) setEmailBody(e.target.getContent()) } const toggleEditor = () => { props.setEditEditor(false) } const lp = () => { props.handleCallback(subject, emailBody) toggleEditor() } return(

{ setSubject(e.target.value)} type="text"/> }
